title: Paul-Emile Borduas, (1905-1960)
creator_credit: Jacques Godbout and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A study of the career of Candian artist Paul-Emile Borduas, showing all his painting styles - his surrealism, his cubism, his automatism, as well as his early workd while he was still apprenticed to Ozias Leduc.
creator_credit_for_label: Jacques Godbout and National Film Board of Canada
